description:
Just when you thought you had a handle on Netflix’s upcoming series, in swoops Joe Swanberg with a star-studded anthology series about modern sex and love. See Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Orlando Bloom, Malin Akerman and so, so many more in the first teaser and photos from Netflix’s Easy September premiere!当你认为你已经对Netflix公司即将推出的系列节目有了了解，在这部震撼的乔斯万博格的明星云集的剧集是关于现代的性与爱。参演有古古玛芭塔劳，奥兰多·布鲁姆，玛琳阿克曼等，在第一个预告片和照片中可以看到更多内容，来自Netflix公司的Easy将于九月首映（9月23日）！

The new eight-episode series was written and directed by Swanberg, starring the likes of Orlando Bloom, Malin Åkerman, Michael Chernus, Marc Maron, Kiersey Clemons, Elizabeth Reaser, Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Jake Johnson, Aya Cash, Dave Franco, Jane Adams, Hannibal Buress, Emily Ratajkowski, Aislinn Derbez, Mauricio Ochmann, Jacqueline Toboni, Zazie Beetz and Evan Joingkeit. 这部新的八集的电视剧是由斯万博格担任编剧兼导演，这部剧的主演是奥兰多布鲁姆，玛琳阿克曼，伊丽莎白里瑟，古古玛芭塔劳，杰克约翰逊，大夫弗兰克，简亚当斯等。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。
